channel.description: Recent content in blog on Ivan's Blog

item.title: Launching Menta
item.description: Last night we launched Menta an online community to help engineers to grow personally and learn. A mixture of events, workshops and mentoring. One of the first we launched in our slack was a channel to help people write/blog more, and since I like to lead by example, this is my first blog post in aaaaages!
